data.text: The best hotel good food and ambience amazing people I love the vibe of the hotel and specially front office staff Danial ,Celia and duty manager Mr sameh amazing people I ever met I recommend this hotel to all those are looking the comfortable stay here
data.title: Thanks to Daniyal and Celia from front office

owner_response.author: Signature Hotel

data.text: I stayed with my family in this hotel for 4 nights. Our room was a classic king size bed furnished with a nice mattress with no enough sitting area (we had 6 baggage full of gifts and personal items ;) ). If you need more space, you may consider upgrading your room to other available classes. It was fairly clean with really nice air conditioning system. The staff at the reception were really nice and friendly. Room service was fine and the food quality was acceptable. Despite these positivities, I had my worst life experience in this hotel. During our stay at this hotel, we refused to have room cleaning service except the last day and it was our biggest mistake. After cleaning service we never checked our baggage and when we returned home in the following day we noticed a few small items are missing from our baggage. I immediately initiated a complaint email to hotel management asking for investigation. The hotel management replied me granting an investigation however the email in the following day was discouraging. I was told their investigation shows no evidence of security breach in my room. I was not expecting a compensation and I wanted to raise awareness and protect the others. If you are planning to stay at this hotel, take more care of your valuable items specially the small size ones. There is a risk of having stolen items from your baggage.
data.title: Be cautious and check your valuables inside your baggage before check out

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Greetings from Signature 1 Hotel. We are truly saddened that your experience was not as great as we would have liked. We regret to hear that you faced such issues during your stay with us. Nevertheless, if you may so kind to assist me on your contact details. Thanks & Regards, Signature Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Signature Hotel

data.text:
Hotel was very reasonable as I had a 30 hour layover so was fine for what I needed.

Nice room, large and good sized bathroom.

Extremely polite staff so would recommend.

About half an hour from the airport.
data.title: Hotel Review

data.text:
Great restaurant and service

We came to relax with our family, we were pleased with the room and the large bed, a cozy veranda and excellent service. I would especially like to mention Martin, who is very friendly and smiling with everyone, especially with children!
data.title: Service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Greetings, we appreciate your positive feedback. It brings us great joy to receive kind words from our guests. We are delighted that our team's services made your stay a happy one. Your recognition of our team is highly valued. We eagerly look forward to seeing you again soon. Thanks & Regards, Signature Hotel Management
